mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.id,sm.parent_id,sm.menu_name,sm.path,sm.component,sm.visible,sm.type,sm.icon,sm.sort FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.role_id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON sm.id=srm.menu_id WHERE sur.user_id=#{userid} AND sr.status=0 AND sm.status=0 AND sm.type != 2;

SELECT DISTINCT sm.perms FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.role_id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON sm.id=srm.menu_id WHERE sur.user_id=#{userid} AND sr.status=0 AND sm.status=0 AND sm.type != 0;

SELECT DISTINCT sm.id,sm.parent_id,sm.menu_name,sm.path,sm.component,sm.visible,sm.type,sm.icon,sm.sort,sm.perms FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.role_id=sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON sm.id=srm.menu_id WHERE sr.status=0 AND sm.status=0 ORDER BY sm.sort

SELECT DISTINCT sm.id, sm.parent_id, sm.menu_name, sm.visible,sm.type,sm.sort FROM sys_user_role AS sur LEFT JOIN sys_role AS sr ON sr.id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.role_id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu AS sm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id WHERE sr.status = 0 AND sm.status = 0 AND sm.visible = 0 ORDER BY sm.sort
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE type = 0 AND status = 0 AND visible = 0 AND del_flag = 0 ORDER BY sort
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE type = 1 AND status = 0 AND visible = 0 AND del_flag = 0 ORDER BY sort
